titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the processing of veterans benefits by the Department of Veterans Affairs, to limit the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to recover overpayments made by the Department and other amounts owed by veterans to the United States, to improve the due process accorded veterans with respect to such recovery, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Veteran Debt Fairness Act of 2018
This bill limits the ability of the Department of Veterans Affair to recover overpayments of benefits from veterans.
